forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 19C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 67F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing late. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 49F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
